Title: MacKenzie Scott Announces 2 74 Billion in New Grants

Description: Scientists at the University of Alberta (U of A) have revealed never before heard sounds of the elusive Canada lynx
Title: Bones crushing and screams Spy mics unearth sounds of Canada Lynx hunting CTV Edmonton

Description: Latin America is investing too little in a green economic recovery from COVID 19, with only 2 of the region's stimulus funds being spent on projects that help fight climate change, new data from Oxford University showed on Thursday
Title: Hard hit by COVID 19, Latin America seen skimping on climate cash Reuters
Author: Anastasia Moloney

Description: Previous COVID 19 infection substantially reduces the risk of a new infection for up to 10 months afterwards, according to a study of care home residents and staff by University College London (UCL) scientists
Title: Prior COVID 19 infection reduces infection risk for 10 months study Reuters
Author: Alistair Smout
